item.title: Just Pretend for a Moment
item.description: Nobody likes confrontation and conflict, am I right? But who doesn’t mind being lost in pretend for a little? So let’s just pretend it’s September 20, one week before the Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump appear at a joint press conference. (It’s not a debate. Hillary’s health won’t be up to a debate that soon.) Now, let’s pretend that Trump’s outreach to Hispanics and blacks worked because Trump’s ahead in the polls.
